amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-754 to extend the timeline for determining permit completeness to 90 days, as requested by the Department of the Interior, and provides flexibility in the timeline to issue final determinations on a permit.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to extend the timeline for determining permit completeness to 90 days and provide flexibility in the timeline to issue final determinations on a geothermal drilling permit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 210 (Roll no. 470).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 210 (Roll no. 470).
